## IExtension.init() method

Will be called when the extension is initialized

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(init: IExtensionInit, registry: IRegistry): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  init | <code>IExtensionInit</code> | Initialization parameters for the extension |
|  registry | <code>IRegistry</code> | The registry where dependencies can be looked up |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
